2:
Do not hide your face from me in my time of trouble.
\q Listen to me.
\q When I call out to you, answer me quickly.
3:
For my days pass away like smoke,
\q and my bones burn like fire.
\q
4:
My heart is crushed, and I am like grass that has withered.
\q I forget to eat any food.
5:
With my continual groaning,
\q I have become very thin.
\q
6:
I am like a pelican of the wilderness;
\q I have become like an owl in the ruins.
7:
I lie awake like a solitary bird,
\q alone on the housetop.
\q
8:
My enemies taunt me all day long;
\q those who mock me use my name in curses.
9:
I eat ashes like bread
\q and mix my drink with tears.
\q
10:
Because of your raging anger,
\q you have lifted me up to throw me down.
11:
My days are like a shadow that fades,
\q and I have withered like grass.
\q
12:
But you, Yahweh, live forever,
\q and your fame is for all generations.
13:
You will rise up and have mercy on Zion.
\q Now is the time to have mercy upon her;
\q the appointed time has come.
\q
14:
For your servants hold her stones dear
\q and feel compassion for the dust of her ruins.
\q
15:
The nations will respect your name, Yahweh,
\q and all the kings of the earth will honor your glory.
\q
16:
Yahweh will rebuild Zion
\q and will appear in his glory.
18:
This will be written for future generations,
\q and a people not yet born will praise Yahweh.
20:
to hear the groaning of the prisoners,
\q to release those who were condemned to death.
21:
Then men will proclaim the name of Yahweh in Zion
\q and his praise in Jerusalem
\q
22:
when the peoples and kingdoms gather together
\q to serve Yahweh.
23:
He has taken away my strength in the middle of life.
\q He has shortened my days.
\q
24:
I said, "My God, do not take me away in the middle of life;
\q you are here throughout all generations.
27:
But you are the same,
\q and your years will have no end.
28:
The children of your servants will live on,
\q and their descendants will live in your presence."
102:
\m
\d A prayer of the afflicted when he is overwhelmed and pours out his lament before Yahweh.
\q
